entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 3:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
